## Toolbox.onDragExit() method

Handles when a cursor with a block or bubble exits this drag target.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onDragExit(_dragElement: IDraggable): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_dragElement | [IDraggable](./blockly.idraggable.md) | The block or bubble currently being dragged. |

**Returns:**

void
